alert.note: Alert for Tuscola (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 29 at 9:05PM EDT by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Tuscola County through 945 PM EDT... At 905 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Akron, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Gagetown around 925 PM EDT. Cass City around 930 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Colwood, Ellington, Deford and Colling. People attending The Cass City Freedom Festival should seek safe shelter immediately! MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
